sentences.en: Andrew took a more optimistic view.
sentences.cn: 安德鲁抱有更为乐观的想法。

sentences.en: Even in our awful tribulation we were quite optimistic.
sentences.cn: 即使在极端痛苦时，我们仍十分乐观。

sentences.en: He is an optimistic young fellow.
He is known for his optimistic can-do attitude.
I have this image of you as always being cheerful and optimistic.
sentences.cn: 你留给我的印象总是快活和乐观.

sentences.en: I know he is too optimistic but I don't want to depress him.
sentences.cn: 我知道他太过乐观了，但我不想令他灰心丧气。

sentences.en: Michael was in a jovial and optimistic mood.
My estimate of the situation is not so optimistic.
sentences.cn: 我对形势的估计不那么乐观.
她感到无忧无虑，很乐观。

sentences.en: She is not optimistic about the outcome.
She's not very optimistic about the outcome of the talks.
sentences.cn: 她对会谈的结果不太乐观。

sentences.en: The book ended on an optimistic note.
The President says she is optimistic that an agreement can be worked out soon.
sentences.cn: 总统说她对很快达成协议持乐观态度。

sentences.en: The rumpus has made all the optimistic statements about unity and harmony ring a little hollow.
sentences.cn: 这一番吵闹使得所有关于团结和谐的乐观言论听起来都显得有几分空洞。

sentences.en: They are guardedly optimistic that the market is on the road to recovery.
sentences.cn: 他们对市场正在复苏的说法保持谨慎的乐观态度。

sentences.en: They are not optimistic about a settlement of the eleven year conflict.
sentences.cn: 他们不是很有信心能和平解决这场长达11年的纷争。

trans.tran_en: believing that good things will happen in the future
